DOC.brief_summary: This open-label extension phase two double-blind , placebo-controled Phase 3 protocol evaluate PEG-uricase treatment hyperuricemic subject symptomatic gout . The purpose study provide continuation treatment subject complete double-blind study obtain long-term safety efficacy data .
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label Extension Study Patients Who Completed Phase 3 Double-blind Study PEG-uricase Symptomatic Gout
DOC.criteria: Completed treatment one two doubleblind , placebo control study PEGuricase subject hyperuricemia symptomatic gout unstable angina uncontrolled arrhythmia uncontrolled hypertension end stage renal disease require dialysis anemia
